text.0:
We are partnering with DW Africa ahead of the 2020 election to flag misinformation and promote accuracy in public discourse. Here is a discussion with DW's Josey Mahachi analysing the ecosystem of misinformation in Ghana. #GhanaElection2020 

https://t.co/ytCK2N5Qu1
text.1: Join our managing editor @alrabiu as he talks through plans to tackle misinformation ahead of the December 7 election. #GhanaElection2020 #GhFactCheckingNetwork https://t.co/rfaU5PSJEW
text.2:
Fake news, disinformation and misinformation is in ascendancy as new media and technolgy is encouraging the easy flow of information.
Be your own "watchdog" against  them.
@ghana_fact 

#Ghelection2020 https://t.co/XiCeHWUlTR
text.3:
Fact-checkers, newsrooms, and civil society groups are banding together to protect Ghana's presidential election from #misinformation

Read about it here :backhand_index_pointing_right: https://t.co/DisbWm4F1A

@ghana_fact @dubawaGH
#factchecking #factcheck #factchecker #facts #ifcn
#GhFactCheckingNetwork https://t.co/BxKy5hibQg
text.5:
“Together we are a stronger voice. Together we can achieve much more.” 
Join us, @dubawaGH, @ghana_fact, @CodeoElections and our media partners to protect #GhanaElection2020 and our democracy from #misinformation #fakenews https://t.co/ovKtFLjSBg
